sys_ux_client_script.name: Close Modal

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_e5b099e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af69
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Taxonomy Topic Selection">edb059e3979c7110a195bbe3a253afe3</macroponent><name>Close Modal</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    api.emit("RECORD#RELATED_LIST_REFRESH_REQUESTED", {
        relatedListName: "m2m_connected_content.knowledge"
    });
    helpers.modal.close();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-02 21:23:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>e5b099e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af69</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Close Modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e5b099e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af69</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-02 21:23:36</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
